aliases: others used during her espionage career

work.occupation: Former National Aeronautics and Space Administration security Chief, former magazine editor, former freelance writer, former military intelligence officer.

connections.groupAffiliation: currently Avengers, former companion to the X-Men (as Carol Danvers), former member of the Starjammers (as Binary), Former Avenger (as Ms. Marvel)
